name: Kimetsu No Yaiba Hinokami Cringe
description:
Controls:
wasd: to move
space: to jump
shift: to run
1: first posture
2: second posture
6: sixth posture
8: eighth posture
hold right click: use posture

Controles:
wasd: para moverse
space: para saltar
shitf: para correr
1: primera postura
2: segunda postura
6: sexta postura
8: octava postura
mantener pulsado Click derecho: usar postura
